name: Projector WordPress theme
tagline: Easily present your design Work In Progress and centralize your client feedback.
body:
### Projector

# Display your **Work In Progress** design projects to your clients and centralize feedback with this easy-to-use free and responsive WordPress theme.
* Showcase your work in a **minimalistic yet highly customizable** web page, protect it by a password and share it with your clients.
* **New feedback messages notifications** are sent via e-mail to comment authors who subscribed. 
* You can also easily **create new versions of WIP projects** that are linked on the front-end.
* Appearance is **highly customizable** (layout, fonts, colors...)
* It's free :-)

This theme is a **very handy tool for any visual creators**, graphic and motion designers, web agencies, architects, photographs...

_Note that this theme is **JUST** a project presentation theme and feedback collector. It does not include any blog, page or other stuff you'll find in another theme._

## Demo
You can see it working [on this WIP project demo page](http://mosaika.fr/clients/wip/monkey-donuts-website-redesign).

## More info
You can read more about this thing [on the Mosaika.fr Projector WordPress Theme page](http://mosaika.fr/services/themes-wordpress/theme-projector/). Yeah, in French.

## Roadmap
* Make the lightbox work (using Clearing from Foundation framework)
* Include a register + login form for clients
* Link clients users role to WIP projects and centralize their authorized projects on a page
* Create a client / admin WIP archives page
* Add a taxonomy to organize projects per category
* Optimize theme for child themes creation
